column4: So why do you think about the question "Why is linux better?" I'm conducting a poll between the three OS's Windows, OS X, and Linux. You can make your response at whyisyourosbetter@gmail.com
What program is good for writing .iso image files? Nautilus doesn't like any that I download... They are the live cd iso's so it's weird...?
What program is good for writing .iso image files?
the command line program is mkisofs      man mkisofs
